item.description:
May 8th is our kick off date - arrive before 8:00 to sign up (or sign up now online) . We'll start with an orientation at 8:00 am. Marathoners will then do a pace run. They'll be assigned to a color group, meet with color group coaches, and head home. Half marathoners will do a training run. Triathletes will do an orientation and a group run.

Subsequent meetings between May 8th and October (other than holiday weekends) will start with a seminar, followed by meeting with your color group coaches, and a long group run. Some Saturdays we will meet at alternate locations (such as Greater Boston Running Company in Lexington, and Castle Island in South Boston).

group.name: Boston Fit Marathon, Half Marathon, and Triathlon Training

item.name: Kick off
